headline: Record heat in London causes outages for public clouds
description:
With 40.2C record set today [1] a series of datacenteres have failed and caused public cloud outages.

Google Cloud [2] Oracle [3]

[1]https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2022/jul/19/uk-weather-record-hottest-day-ever-heatwave [2]https://status.cloud.google.com/incidents/fmEL9i2fArADKawkZAa2 [3] https://ocistatus.oraclecloud.com/#/

[1] https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2022/jul/19/uk-weather-record-hottest-day-ever-heatwave?CMP=twt_gu&utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium#Echobox=1658232431
